new.description: Button to create a new filter

new_title.description: Button to create a new filter

new_input.message: Channelname to apply the blacklist or whitelist to

blacklist_title.message: List of video titles you don't want to see

whitelist_title.message: List of video titles you want to see

trash_title.message: Temporarily enable or disable a filter

switch_title.message: Temporarily enable or dissable a filter

banner_title.message: Click to go to the youtube channel video page

warning_message.message: You are currently not on Youtube subscriptions. You are only having reduced functionality right now. If the add-on is freshly installed and you see this warning try refreshing the subscription page

blacklist_time_range_message.description: Explains the message on screen for the blacklist time range filter

youtube_short_deactivation.message: Click to dissable youtube shorts. When red the filter is active
youtube_short_deactivation.description: Explains the message on screen for the dissabling youtube shorts
